blur_detection.description: The receipt shows good clarity with clear, readable text throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed; current image quality is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent black text against white background with strong contrast for optimal readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed; current contrast is ideal for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: Minor shadow/glare is visible in the upper left corner from what appears to be a glass ashtray, but doesn't affect text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the glare doesn't impact any text areas of the receipt.

water_stains.description: No water damage, staining or discoloration is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed; receipt appears clean and free of water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears flat with no visible tears, creases or folds affecting text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed; current condition is ideal for data extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt is fully captured within the frame with all edges and content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed; full receipt is visible in the image.

missing_sections.description: All standard receipt sections are present including header, line items, tax information, and total amount.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed; receipt appears complete with all relevant sections visible.

obstructions.description: A glass object (likely an ashtray) is partially visible in the upper left corner but doesn't obstruct any receipt text.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the obstruction doesn't impact the receipt content.
